newsitem.title: USA: RESEARCH ALERT - Cowen lowers Heartstream.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT - Cowen lowers Heartstream.

text.p: -- Cowen and Co said it downgraded Heartstream Inc to buy from strong buy.

-- Heartstream earlier said it expects first quarter revenues of $1.0-$1.3 million, and a net loss per share of $0.35 to $0.38. First Call listed the consensus Wall Street expectation for the quarter at a loss of $0.37.
-- Cowen analyst Michael Mullen said the disappointment came in the sales line, which had been expected at about $2 million for the quarter.
-- Heartstream cited longer-than-expected customer decision-making processes and smaller evaluation orders led to lower-than-anticipated sales during the quarter.
